places.name: Lords Plaza Surat
places.description: Lords Plaza Surat offers luxurious rooms with modern amenities, a rooftop swimming pool, a fitness centre, and a restaurant serving Indian, Chinese, and Western dishes. Conveniently located near the railway terminal and airport, it provides free Wi-Fi, comfortable seating areas, and en suite bathrooms. The property has a rating of 9 out of 10 according to Tripadvisor.

places.name: Hotel Sifat International
places.description: Hotel Sifat International is a 3-star property in Surat with air-conditioned rooms, free WiFi, and a restaurant serving Chinese cuisine. Enjoy a buffet or continental breakfast and plan your stay with the help of the English and Hindi speaking staff. The property has a rating of 8 out of 10 according to Tripadvisor.

places.name: SMC Pay & Use Public Toilet
places.description: SMC Pay & Use Public Toilet is located in Rustampura, Surat. It is a 5-star facility with air-conditioned rooms, free WiFi, and a restaurant serving Chinese cuisine. The English and Hindi speaking staff are available to assist you. The property has a rating of 5 out of 5 according to user reviews.

places.name: Portable Toilet Cabin
places.description: Portable Toilet Cabin in Surat offers steel rectangular cabins for construction sites. These cabins are 4’ x 4’ in size and come with comfortable seating areas, en suite bathrooms, and free Wi-Fi. The property provides a convenient solution for sanitation needs. No. of compartments: 1. It is a trusted supplier with verified trustseal.

places.name: Jani Locho House
places.description: Jani Locho House serves the tempting street food of Surat, including the famous 'Locho.' Locho is a delightful dish born out of a mistake during the preparation of Khaman. Served with tangy green chutney and crispy sev, it’s a must-try! Visit Jani Locho & Khaman House for the best Locho in entire Surat.

places.name: Mini Meals
places.description: Mini Meals offers a range of Surati Indian street food specialties. From Misal Pav to Nan Khatai, you’ll find a variety of flavors here. The English and Hindi speaking staff are ready to assist you.

places.name: Gangour
places.description: Gangour is another popular street food stall in Surat. Their menu includes delicious treats like Ghari, Undhiyu, Bhajiya, and Ponk Vadas.

places.name: Kailash Sweets and Snacks
places.description: At Kailash Sweets and Snacks, indulge in mouth-watering Surti Sev Khamani, Pav Bhaji, and other delightful street food items.

places.name: Motiram
places.description: Motiram is known for its delectable Chatkaaz and other street food delights. Don’t miss out on their flavorful offerings!

places.name: Veer Narmad South Gujarat University
places.description: Veer Narmad South Gujarat University is a well-known institution in Surat. It offers various undergraduate and postgraduate programs. The campus is located in the heart of the city.

places.name: Sardar Vallabhbhai National Institute of Technology, Surat
places.description: Sardar Vallabhbhai National Institute of Technology (SVNIT) is a premier engineering college in Surat. It offers B.Tech programs in various disciplines. SVNIT has a strong reputation for academic excellence and research.

places.name: AURO University
places.description: AURO University is a private university in Surat. It offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses in various fields, including management, law, and liberal arts. The campus provides a conducive environment for holistic development.

places.name: Bhagwan Mahavir University
places.description: Bhagwan Mahavir University is a multidisciplinary institution in Surat. It offers programs in engineering, management, pharmacy, and other fields. The university focuses on practical learning and industry exposure.

places.name: Sarvajanik College of Engineering and Technology
places.description: Sarvajanik College of Engineering and Technology (SCET) is a renowned engineering college in Surat. It offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses in engineering and technology. SCET emphasizes research and innovation.

places.name: Indian Institute of Information Technology, Surat
places.description: Indian Institute of Information Technology (IIIT), Surat, is an institute of national importance. It offers B.Tech programs in computer science and electronics. IIIT Surat focuses on cutting-edge research and technology.

places.name: C. K. Pithawala College of Engineering and Technology
places.description: C. K. Pithawala College of Engineering and Technology is an engineering college in Surat. It provides undergraduate programs in various engineering disciplines. The college aims to produce skilled professionals.

places.name: METAS of Seventh-day Adventist Colleges
places.description: METAS of Seventh-day Adventist Colleges is a Christian institution in Surat. It offers programs in nursing, education, and other fields. The college promotes values-based education and community service.
